name: Flower Bundle- Five Assorted Colors and Sizes
description:
Handcrafted in the US these unique flowers are an not just hair decorations. They are accessories that can be used to dress up many parts of you or your little girls outfit. They are made to move around your wardrobe and make you feel extra special and girlie. One flower can be interchange and worn on your purse or bag, headband, scarf, sweater or jacket. 

Flowers are 100% polyester and include a removable hairclip with your initial purchase.


** Flowers do contain small parts and children should be supervised when wearing. All flowers are machine washable and can be dried in the dryer. To help your flower live the longest possible life with you,we do however recommend that you place them on a towel to air dry.****
